1957.HK.summary: MBV International Limited, an investment holding company, engages in sourcing, wholesaling, supplying, and marketing imprintable apparel and gift products in Malaysia and Singapore. It provides a portfolio of imprintable apparel, including T-shirts, uniforms, and jackets, as well as other casual wear and accessories The company sells its products through direct selling by its sales representatives, as well as from its printed product catalogues and online platform. It serves shop retailers, garment trading and processing companies, and end consumers and others. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Johor Bahru, Malaysia. MBV International Limited is a subsidiary of MBV Capital Limited.
